fullplot: "While hospitalized with an extreme case of psoriasis, novelist Dan Dark reworks his first book in his head. Feverish, paranoid and prone to musical outbreaks, he confuses himself with his protagonist, a detective investigating the murder of a prostitute in 1950s Los Angeles."
plot: From his hospital bed, a writer suffering from a skin disease hallucinates musical numbers and paranoid plots.
title: The Singing Detective

tomatoes.consensus: Delightful performance from Robert Downey Jr. can't save The Singing Detective's transition from TV to the big screen.
